reviews.review_msg: ok, studying about the environment, sounds easy and interesting right?...NOT. I chose the wrong course for an elective and it screwed up my GPA. He seems like a nice guy but for me, a person who doesnt really care about the environment , this course sucks.

Course material is very interesting although lectures may be boring at times, but if you're into social science/geography this course is  recommended, assignments and term paper were straight forward and marked fairly. The only complaints would be the heavy reading load and the all-essay final.

Thoroughly enjoyed the course and his teaching style.  No midterm and a couple of easy assignments.  One big term paper but if you try its not that bad.  If you've taken an econ class you will do well.  He has an econ background and does not hide it very well.

Actually i love the guests he invited more than him...Course is imteresting...However....what is going to be in the exam..actaully not exactly clear.........Tut is good...i have a nice time to discuss. .....Lecture...sigh...i feel stupid la
Interesting but the lectures are DULL! It is sometimes hard to follow what he is stressing as important
He explains everything clearly and makes it easy to understand. Hes well organized.  Good teacher
I like how he tries to explain his points without swinging left nor right. Bias is thoroughly restrained. Encourages people to form their own opinions. I like that.
Valuable course material but everything tests and assignments are essay format.
Valuable course material about the environment. Sometimes talks in monotone.
